chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 product has the above problem: 
The package is marked as delivered, but it hasn't arrived, the recipient's name will be Mesut and we don't know him! What to do???? 
Thank you very much for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner about this situation and requested for the POD.  In case the order is not found and the customer chooses a replacement, we would need to check if there is still stock available after an investigation is open.

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. Should the customer wish to contest, kindly send us the necessary documents. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. Kindly do not refund the customer, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for the POD. 

However, the customer is called "Myriam Schwickert-Nieswandt" and not "MESUT".

We will forward the POD to the customer and keep you posted regarding further developments. 

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team
